violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Light of the proper intensity shall be provided as specified.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A toilet room used by females shall be provided with a covered receptacle for sanitary napkins.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
During pauses in FOOD preparation or dispensing, UTENSILS shall be stored:
(A) In the FOOD with their handles above the top of the FOOD and the container;
(B) In FOOD that is not POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS with their handles above the      top of the FOOD within containers or EQUIPMENT that can be closed, such as      bins of sugar, flour, or cinnamon;
(C) On a clean portion of the FOOD preparation table or cooking EQUIPMENT
(D)  In running water, such as dipper well.
(E)  In a clean, protected location if the UTENSILS, such as ice scoops, are   used only with a FOOD that is not POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS; or
(F)  In a container of water maintained at a temperature of at least 135Â° F.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store with handle extended out of product.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL shall be stored so they can not contaminate FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES by:   
(A) Separating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL by spacing or partitioning; (P) and   
(B) Locating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL in an area that is not above FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.  This paragraph does not apply to EQUIPMENT and UTENSIL cleaners and sanitizers that are stored in WAREWASHING areas for availability and convenience if the materials are stored to prevent contamination of FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store toxics below and away from all other items.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except otherwise approved, and except for antislip floor coverings or applications may be used for safety reasons, floors, floor coverings, walls, wall coverings, and ceilings shall be designed, constructed, and installed so they are SMOOTH and EASILY CLEANABLE.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not constructed, designed, installed to be
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Repair/replace to be smooth and easily cleanable.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) In FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which cleaning methods other than water flushing are used for cleaning floors, the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and closed to no larger than one thirty-second inch.
(B) The floors in FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which water flush cleaning methods are used shall be provided with drains and be graded to drain, and the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and SEALED.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Filters or other grease extracting EQUIPMENT shall be designed to be readily removable for cleaning and replacement if not designed to be cleaned in place.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A PLUMBING SYSTEM shall be installed to preclude backflow of contaminants into the water supply system at each point of use at the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT by providing an air gap or installing an APPROVED backflow prevention device. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A PLUMBING SYSTEM shall be installed to preclude backflow of contaminants into the water supply system at each point of use at the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT by providing an air gap or installing an APPROVED backflow prevention device. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: At the base of the Door

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
FOOD shall be protected from contamination by storing the FOOD:
(1)     In a clean, dry location;
(2)     Where it is not exposed to splash, dust, or other contamination; and
(3)     At least 15 cm (6 inches) above the floor, unless otherwise approved.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Exposed to dust, splash, or other contaminates

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: The PREMISES shall be free of items that are unnecessary to the operation or maintenance of the establishment such as EQUIPMENT that is nonfunctional, no longer used and free of litter.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Lady of the House, LLC
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES shall be free of unnecessary ledges, projections, and crevices, and designed and constructed to allow easy cleaning and to facilitate maintenance.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Replace/seal to be smooth, durable, non-absorbent, and easily cleanable.
